The video was published on Facebook on O: 2020, with an Arabic caption mentioning the burning of the French embassy in response to President Macron's Islamophobic remarks.
A reverse image search using the InVID: WeVerify verification tool revealed that the footage dates back to 2012, as it appeared in several news reports at that time.
Various news reports from 2012 confirmed: Sudan, in reaction to a film perceived as offensive to Islam and Muslims. There were no recent reports of attacks on France's embassy in Sudan.
